alert.note: Alert for Far Northwest Highlands; Northern Sangre de Cristo Mountains; Southern Sangre de Cristo Mountains; Tusas Mountains Including Chama (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albuquerque (Northern and Central New Mexico)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued January 16 at 3:19PM MST until January 18 at 12:00AM MST by NWS Albuquerque
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL MIDNIGHT MST TUESDAY NIGHT... * WHAT...Heavy snow expected. Total snow accumulations between 6 and 15 inches with the highest amounts expected over west-facing slopes above 10,000 feet. * WHERE...Northern and Southern Sangre de Cristo Mountains, Far Northwest Highlands, and Tusas Mountains Including Chama. * WHEN...Until Midnight MST Tuesday Night. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible. Some roads may be closed. Significant travel delays are possible.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. For the latest road conditions, dial 511 or 1.800.432.4269, or visit http://nmroads.com.

area.areaDesc: Far Northwest Highlands; Northern Sangre de Cristo Mountains; Southern Sangre de Cristo Mountains; Tusas Mountains Including Chama
